snippet.title: Dragon Ball FighterZ - XB1/PS4/PC - Mighty Clashes (Bardock & Broly release trailer)
snippet.description:
Bardock and Broly DLCs release tomorrow for Dragon Ball FighterZ! 
Enjoy this trailer for a preview of the mighty clashes you'll play from March 28th. (SPOILER ALERT: dramatic scenes are revealed on this trailer)
Purchase the FighterZ Pass to get these characters and 6 more to be released in the coming months or get them individually on PS4, XB1 and PC.

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/DBZ.videogames
Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
